meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Call to order by the Board President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Roll call conducted by the Assistant General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of February 25, 2025, DPFC Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: DPFC Board members should disclose any relationships with the projects on the agenda.

agenda_items.title: Fencing and Security Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the fencing and security for 9999 Technology Blvd, Dallas TX.

agenda_items.title: Executive Session
agenda_items.description: Executive session to deliberate employment and duties of candidates selected by the DPFC Staff Hiring Committee.

agenda_items.title: Staff Hiring Committee Discussion
agenda_items.description: Deliberation and discussion of resumes collected by the DPFC Staff Hiring Committee.

agenda_items.title: Reconvene in Open Session
agenda_items.description: The DPFC Board may reconvene in open session and act on any item listed on the Executive Session Agenda.

agenda_items.title: Policy Changes Feedback
agenda_items.description: Discussion and feedback on proposed changes to Policy, Operations, and Bylaws.

agenda_items.title: Appointments to Committees
agenda_items.description: Appointments of new board members to Committees.

agenda_items.title: Property Monitoring Procedures
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on DPFC-owned property monitoring procedures.

agenda_items.title: Use of Excess Funds
agenda_items.description: Discussion of the use of DPFC excess funds.

agenda_items.title: Preliminary 2025 Budget Approval
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the preliminary 2025 DPFC budget.

agenda_items.title: Website Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC Website.

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report Discussion
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC pipeline report.

financial_items.description: Preliminary 2025 DPFC budget discussion and approval
